EmailTemplate.name: Not Yet Contacted Email
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Contact.Full_Name__c} Has not been contacted in a Week!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.Sales_Head__c}
Your Contact {!Contact.Full_Name__c} has not been contacted in a week. They have expressed interest in working with New York Engineers and the sooner they are contacted the better.
If you have questions about {!Contact.Full_Name__c} please ask Manager- Projects, Keith Fink nicely, and he will gladly hand over any information he has.
Best Manager- Projects, Keith Fink
DISCLAIMER: This message is meant for the intended party and no others. This data has been scienced by professionals and non data scientists may hurt themselves trying to comprehend its beauty
